ready to learn some new skills or stitch combinations concepts include working to gauge color changes reading charts special stitches seaming and blocking notes from the designer embark on a 12-month crochet adventure as you craft the arcoiris mcal arcoiris the spanish word for rainbow perfectly describes this project s journey through a continuous spectrum of hues representing all the colors of the rainbow the process begins with a foundation of bold texture structurally linked to the next clue via a unique two-color transition section your journey will take you through a diverse range of stitchwork exploring both delicate lacework and rich dimensional texture midway the construction shifts to a new panel that introduces ornate flowing designs before building to deep autumnal texture finally the project culminates with a dimensional geometric piece worked in the round before the three sections are united and crowned with a final embellishment this project is stitched using wishglow sport yarn a heavenly two-ply blend of 50% superwash fine merino wool and 50% mulberry silk this light and airy yarn provides an unbelievably soft shimmering glow and supple drape making it a
